name: Shadow Casters
description:
~ Description ~

In the spirit of Halloween, witches use their spells to cast out the shadows and battle it out in this bomberman inspired game!
Inspired by Jakub Wasilewski shadow shader implementation in PICO-8.

Winner of Teesside Game Jam 2019 made in 2 days with much love!

~ Controls ~

Player1:

WASD - Move

Q  - Cast spell

Player2:

Arrow Keys - Move

R Control - Cast spell

~ Credits ~ 

Andreas Cealera - Programmer

Francisco Murias - Art / Game Design / Music and Sounds

Gao Ya - Art

Justinas Grigas - Programmer
